attributes.action: anyone who takes indecent photos and sexual assaults parental right away
attributes.additional_details: It has been very frustration and hard to try and sage guard my children due to being told that they can't do any thing cos he has parental rights
attributes.background: Chance the law so that men are not allowed parental right if they have sexualy abuse young children or taken indecent photographers of young children

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

'Remove parental responsibility from child sexual offenders and child abusers'
